install.author: Kawin Glomjai
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Theme Joomla, Site Source Solution. All rights reserved.
install.description: Adds a functionality to let you re-order your table items by dragging and dropping rows and pressing the save button. Remember to publish the plugin in your plugins administration area!

param.name: table_class
param.label: Table Class
param.description: Enter the table class you would like to apply the drag n drop features. This allows for specific table enabling. Default: adminlist

param.name: oddrow
param.label: Odd Row Text Color
param.description: Enter the color in pixels of your odd row table text.

param.name: evenrow
param.label: Even Row Text Color
param.description: Enter the color in pixels of your even row table text.

param.name: use_jquery
param.label: Use Included jQuery
param.description: Choose whether to use the included jQuery. Disable if your site admin is allready using jQuery. Default is Yes as most Joomla Admin areas do not use jQuery.

param.name: show_arrows
param.label: Show Reorder Arrows
param.description: Choose whether to show or hide the reorder arrows. Arrows are not required if using this plugin, but you might want them anyway.
